data.desc: Coffee is considered by many to be the most popular hot beverage in the world. Millions of people start off their day with a cup of joe, and it’s not surprising, considering the strong effect it can have on improving productivity and focus.
Tea has been around almost as long as civilization—it was discovered nearly 5,000 years ago in ancient China.

Although Coca-Cola doesn’t fall into the traditional category of types of drinks because it’s actually a specific brand, the sheer amount that is consumed each year warrants inclusion on the most popular beverage in the world list.
